property.name: mapreduce.framework.name
property.description: Specifies that YARN will be used as the MapReduce execution framework.

property.name: mapreduce.output.fileoutputformat.compress
property.description: Enable compression for job output files.

property.name: mapreduce.job.reduces
property.description: Sets the number of reducers for MapReduce jobs.

property.name: mapreduce.map.memory.mb
property.description: Sets the heap size in MB for map tasks (1GB in this case).
